location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to J. W. Walker, Persian Secretary to the Government in Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter concerns diplomatic relations between Bombay and Persia. Stannus writes to Walker, enclosing a letter (not included in the file) from the Prince of Shiraz, which commends Meer Gool Mahomed Padohah Khan, son of the Amin of Kooghan, to the Resident's good offices, and requests an introduction to the Honourable the Governor in Council at Bombay. Stannus adds that he does not have a ship at his disposal to offer passage to the individual to Bombay.
